build.beforeDevCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');const dirs=['frontend','../frontend','.'];let dir=null;for(const d of dirs){if(fs.existsSync(d+'/package.json')){dir=d;break;}}if(!dir){console.error('找不到 frontend/package.json（请在仓库根或 src-tauri 目录启动）');process.exit(1);}const npm=process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm';const r=cp.spawnSync(npm,['--prefix',dir,'run','dev'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
build.beforeBuildCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');const dirs=['frontend','../frontend','.'];let dir=null;for(const d of dirs){if(fs.existsSync(d+'/package.json')){dir=d;break;}}if(!dir){console.error('找不到 frontend/package.json（请在仓库根或 src-tauri 目录启动）');process.exit(1);}const npm=process.platform==='win32'?'npm.cmd':'npm';const r=cp.spawnSync(npm,['--prefix',dir,'run','build'],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status??1);"
